channel.title: Head count of who still plays?
channel.description:
Post if you still play..
Looking to get a clan together again for some upcoming gwd. Let me know if you're down.

item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

There was a poll for f2p and people voted no?

No the poll before OSRS came out, had to reach a certain amount to make it available to all players, not sure what the amount was, like 500,000 or 750,000?

But it only reached 449,351 votes

item.title: Head count of who still plays?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:5, topic:531033”]Well tbh it’s going to be ridiculously hard for us to get in on bandos unless we all are playing at night.
I would recommend ATLEAST level 85 in the combat skill of your choice. So 85 def and 85 range or 85 def 85 str 85 attack. If we can get about 5 of us then we are set.

I am currently botting combat so it’ll be a while for me… but I am sure gwd will be a while.

I will also help out with funding your accounts if you’re poor.[/quote]

It’s not that i’m poor, it’s that I spent all my money on logs and bow string.

Read full topic
item.source: Head count of who still plays?

item.title: Head count of who still plays?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Well tbh it’s going to be ridiculously hard for us to get in on bandos unless we all are playing at night.
I would recommend ATLEAST level 85 in the combat skill of your choice. So 85 def and 85 range or 85 def 85 str 85 attack. If we can get about 5 of us then we are set.

I am currently botting combat so it’ll be a while for me… but I am sure gwd will be a while.

I will also help out with funding your accounts if you’re poor.

Read full topic
